intro.description: To open the New Business Rule creation wizard, expand the Rules node under Libraries in the DQ Repository view. Right click the SQL folder and select New Business Rule. The wizard prompts you to enter the rule's metadata (name, purpose, description...). Enter the WHERE clause to be used in the analysis and click Finish. Upon completion, an editor opens in which you can set the Business Rule information and content.

item.title: Set the Business Rule information and content
item.description:
In the editor, you can modify the Rule metadata if required. You can also modify the Business Rule by changing the WHERE clause or by adding a new one. Set the criticality level to indicate the importance of the Business Rule.
To set join conditions, click Join Conditions to expand the editor. Then drop the relevant columns onto the box and define them as either Column A or Column B. Click the Operator cell between the corresponding columns and select the sign which reflects the join condition that you want to define.
